Step3.Description: The attacker realizes that only the last line of command output is displayed, making it challenging to locate files.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker decides to modify the payload to make it easier to navigate the server's file system.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker modifies the payload to '; <command> | tr '\n' '' #', replacing newlines with spaces in the output.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully obtains cleaner output, making it easier to navigate the server.
